result.title: Final report 2
result.description: Due to the epidemic the experimental preparation work that was to be undertaken in the period was not Three months after the commencement of lockdown this laboratory remains closed some facilities onsite are starting to reopen in a phased approach but this facility is not yet available New working arrangements onsite due to Covid controls are very restrictive and will further impact the task It seems that a period of 6 months of TRANSAT prolongation is necessary to accomplish all the experimental studies related to deliverable D44This delay can induce an extension of TRANSAT of 5 month related to this deliverable and associated task However no impact on other deliverables foreseen

result.title: General building stock data for European buildings and specific data for the frontrunner partners
result.description: General building stock data for European buildings and specific data for the frontrunner partners Task 41 will collect merge and format relevant data to establish a model of the building stock of the frontrunner municipalities Data gaps will be identified and solutions will be developed to fill these gaps in the future The partners will gather sort and inspect various kinds of dataformats even scanning documents on paper to provide the most detailed information on the building stock of the frontrunner partners The collected data will be sorted and processed in line with international norms and structuresLocal building data will be extended with already available European datasets comprising demographic data research and scientific data statistical socioeconomic datasets and georeferenced datasets eg GMLfiles of European regions
